description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. The current implementation has a hardcoded division by 0 which will always raise a ZeroDivisionError. The fix changes the return statement to properly divide a by the parameter b. - Fix division operation to divide by parameter b instead of hardcoded 0

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. The current implementation has a hardcoded division by 0 which will always raise a ZeroDivisionError. The fix changes the return statement to properly divide a by the parameter b.
